title: Funded Trading Plus 10% OFF
description: Funded Trading Plus, based in the United Kingdom, was established in November 2021. It is a CFD firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps and Instant program types. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MT5, MT4, cTrader, DXTrade and Match Trader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

forbidden_strategies: Symbol Loss Limit - Hard breach: 2% (Prestige Lite/Pro only).

payout_policy.minimum_payout: $50. Prestige Lite/Pro: 1% of initial account balance.
payout_policy.processing_time: 1-Step/Advanced/Instant: On demand, then every 7 days. Prestige Lite/Premium: Weekly. Prestige Pro: Flexible (Weekly/Bi-weekly).
payout_policy.details: Profit Split: Starts at 80%. Upgrade to 90% at 20% profit, 100% at 30% profit (lifetime). Add-ons available.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Prohibited across accounts. Allowed from personal/other prop firm accounts to FT+. No third-party copy traders.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed on cTrader and MT5. No abusive strategies (arbitrage, grid trading, cheating).
firm_rules.news_trading: Allowed, provided no 'one-sided bet' (risking majority of account on single news trade).
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Allowed except for Advance & Master Trader Programs (close by 4:30pm EST Friday). Crypto allowed on all.
forbidden_strategies: Symbol Loss Limit - Hard breach: 2% (Prestige Lite/Pro only).

seo_content:
Funded Trading Plus Technical Infrastructure

Funded Trading Plus, based in the United Kingdom, was established in November 2021. It is a CFD firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps and Instant program types. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MT5, MT4, cTrader, DXTrade and Match Trader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
